name: BadMouThing
description:
## Pitch
In the begining there nothing was.
When start with nothing, run. Because
Bad tongue is coming, letters near.
You run, they're hunt you. They are here

## Controls
- Up Arrow - Jump
- Left Arrow - Move Left
- Right Arrow - Move Right
- Space - Attack
- B - Just Badmouthing

## Context
This project was created as a Jam participation in Ludum Dare 45 by the group of GameDev enthusiasts.
